delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.text: Do you really want to delete this download? This process cannot be undone.

matchRate.title: Matched products
matchRate.text_all: We matched <bold>all</bold> of your requested {{ requested }} products.
matchRate.text_some: We matched <bold>{{ matched }} products</bold> out of your requested {{ requested }} products.
matchRate.text_someTODO:add: Download the list of unmatched products to check which ones.

contentScore.title: Content score
contentScore.text: The product information for the products you requested has on average a {{ score }} quality.

averagePrice.title: Average price per product
averagePrice.text: You pay an average of <price></price> per product. This price is based on the content score.

empty.title: No search results
empty.text: Unfortunately! We found no products for your search.
